sentence: (RELATED : ‘As Wrong As It Gets’: Rep. Jim Jordan Calls Out Liberal Media And Democrats For Denying That Trump Was Spied On) “Jacqui, my answer is not going to change, I refer you to the Department of Justice,” Jean-Pierre repeated.
author: Nicole Silverio
title: ‘Can’t Speak To That’: Karine Jean-Pierre Repeatedly Dodges Questions On Durham Report When Pressed By Fox News Reporter

author: Rob Crilly
title: 'I can't speak to that': Biden's Deputy Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre tells reporter THREE times to go to the DOJ when pressed on Durham's bombshell allegations Hillary spied on Trump when he was president and Biden knew about it
